did.unittitle: Letter from Richard Harding Davis to J. Davis Broadhead October 1 [1916]

scopecontent.p: Davis thanks Brodhead for his recent letter; refers to a cable from Platt who had obtained permission "to carry us to and from the mines on the company's railroad and has hired soldiers, forts, ships and moon lit plazas;" and mentions seeing Nora and [Nell].

did.unittitle: Photograph of Richard Harding Davis n.d.
did.physdesc: Photograph, 14.5 x 10.4 cm mounted on board 14.7 x 10.5 cm.

scopecontent.p: Head and chest of Davis, with a flower in his lapel, signed in ink "Faithfully, Richard Harding Davis;" taken by Bassano Ltd. Photographis Studio, Pall Mall.
